ðŸ“– Summary: ContextGem is an open-source LLM framework designed to simplify the extraction of structured data from documents. It provides powerful abstractions to automate dynamic prompts, data modeling, and granular reference mapping, reducing boilerplate code and development overhead. The framework aims to make LLM-based document intelligence more accessible and efficient.
